articles.author: Michael Peel
articles.title: AI robot uses meteorite from Mars to help make oxygen from water - Financial Times
articles.description: Chinese experiment raises hopes for viability of mission to red planet and planetary colonisation
articles.content:
A robot has used meteorite extracts from Mars to help make oxygen from water, melding artificial intelligences powers of chemical discovery with efforts to explore and even populate the red planet.
